name: Ball Boy's Cool Party
description:
For Ludum Dare 50

Theme "Delay the Inevitable"

Get pyramid to stay at your party as long as possible, using only your formidable powers of conversation!

No one else turned up...

Big thanks to Flowerhead for the music! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXb6QLCaLxjvucwNlQuS2gg

Dev Note: There's a lot we didn't get done, and it just about works. We'll be continuing with this for sure :)
